bioghist.p: Attorney in Sandusky, Mich. His son Lucien Mastin Meredith (1904-1994) was graduate of Albion College.

scopecontent.p: George and Lucien Meredith correspondence documents recent college graduate experience looking for a job during Great Depression. Also included several football programs and miscellaneous ephemera.
